table.name: version_ver
table.description: History of all version upgrades applied to this database

table.name: person_per
table.description: This contains the main person data, including person names, person addresses, person phone numbers, and foreign keys to the family table

table.name: whycame_why
table.description: This contains the comments related to why people came

table.name: person_custom
table.description: Person custom fields

table.name: person_custom_master
table.description: This contains definitions for the custom person fields

table.name: family_fam
table.description: This contains the main family data, including family name, family addresses, and family phone numbers

table.name: note_nte
table.description: Contains all person and family notes, including the date, time, and person who entered the note

table.name: config_cfg
table.description: This table contains all non-default configuration parameter names and values

table.name: group_grp
table.description: This contains the name and description for each group, as well as foreign keys to the list of group roles

column.name: grp_Type
column.description: The group type. This is defined in list_lst.OptionId where lst_ID=3

column.name: grp_RoleListID
column.description: The lst_ID containing the names of the roles for this group

column.name: grp_DefaultRole
column.description: The ID of the default role in this group's RoleList

column.name: grp_include_email_export
column.description: Should members of this group be included in MailChimp Export

table.name: groupprop_master
table.description: This contains definitions for the group-specific fields

table.name: person2group2role_p2g2r
table.description: This table stores the information of which people are in which groups, and what group role each person holds in that group

table.name: canvassdata_can
table.description: this contains information about the results of canvassing families

table.name: deposit_dep
table.description: This records deposits / payments

table.name: donationfund_fun
table.description: This contains the defined donation funds

table.name: event_attend
table.description: this indicates which people attended which events

table.name: events_event
table.description: This contains events

table.name: pledge_plg
table.description: This contains all payment/pledge information

table.name: list_lst
table.description: This table stores the options for most of the drop down lists in churchCRM, including person classifications, family roles, group types, group roles, group-specific property types, and custom field value lists.

column.name: lst_ID
column.description: The ID of the list. Since this is a composite primary key, there may be multiple List IDs

column.name: lst_OptionID
column.description: The ID of the option in this list. ***List ID + List Option ID must be unique***

column.name: lst_OptionSequence
column.description: The order in which to display items in this list

column.name: lst_OptionName
column.description: The actual value for this list option

table.name: user_usr
table.description: This contains the login information and specific settings for each ChurchCRM user

table.name: volunteeropportunity_vol
table.description: This contains the names and descriptions of volunteer opportunities

table.name: queryparameters_qrp
table.description: defines the parameters for each query

table.name: kioskdevice_kdev
table.description: This contains a list of all (un)registered kiosk devices

column.name: kdev_GUIDHash
column.description: SHA256 Hash of the GUID stored in the kiosk's cookie

column.name: kdev_lastHeartbeat
column.description: Last time the kiosk sent a heartbeat

column.name: kdev_Accepted
column.description: Has the admin accepted the kiosk after initial registration?

column.name: kdev_PendingCommands
column.description: Commands waiting to be sent to the kiosk

column.name: kasm_EventId
column.description: Optional. If the current role is for event check-in, populate this value

table.name: record2property_r2p
table.description: This table indicates which persons, families, or groups are assigned specific properties and what the values of those properties are.

foreign-key.description: This contains the definition of all person, family, and group properties

table.name: propertytype_prt
table.description: This contains all the defined property types

table.name: person2volunteeropp_p2vo
table.description: This table indicates which people are tied to which volunteer opportunities

table.name: event_audience
table.description: This is a join-table to link an event with a prospective audience for the purpose of advertising / outreach

table.name: locations
table.description: This is a table for storing all physical locations (Church Offices, Events, etc)

table.name: calendar_events
table.description: This is a join-table to link an event with a calendar
